<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	14
</B>
	.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Service Contractor shall coordinate with and provide prior written notice to Agent when access to occupied space is required. Service Contractor shall give notice
	according to the following schedule.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Less than one hour required in the space; provide 24-hour advance notice.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	b.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Less than one day required in the space; provide two days advance notice.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	c.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	More than one day required in the space; provide three days advance notice.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	15
</B>
	.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	All Service Contractors must sign in with the security guard. An Agent&#146;s representative must be contacted that the Contractor is on-site.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	16
</B>
	.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Service Contractor shall not be permitted any identifying signage or advertising unless approved by Agent in writing.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	17
</B>
	.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Service Contractor shall turn off lights and all other equipment at night after completion of work for the day.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	18
</B>
	.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Building hours are 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. Monday through Friday. Work beyond these hours is subject to approval by Agent.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	19
</B>
	.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Service Contractor may only use the freight elevator to transport equipment, materials or supplies. Agent reserves the right to restrict times Service Contractor
	may use freight elevator.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	20
</B>
	.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Service Contractor shall arrange for pre-inspection of Tenant suites prior to construction to identify items subject to potential claims for breakage, theft, abuse,
	damage, etc. Service Contractor&#146;s General Superintendent and Subcontractor Foreman, Tenant Representative, and Agent&#146;s Property Manager and Building Engineer shall attend pre-inspections.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	21
</B>
	.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Service Contractor shall not interfere with other Tenants in such a manner as to cause unnecessary inconvenience or disruption. Work of this nature must be scheduled
	before 8:00 a.m. and after 6:00 p.m. Work that disrupts nearby Tenants must cease immediately upon request of the Agent and rescheduled for completion on an after-hour basis.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	22
</B>
	.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Use of odor causing or particulate generating practices during normal business hours is prohibited.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	18
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage149"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	23
</B>
	.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Agent shall have the right from time to time as may be required, to inspect or perform work within the property. Agent shall have the right to suspend Service
	Contractor&#146;s Work in the property if such work, in the opinion of the Agent, is presenting or may present
<I>
	a
</I>
	danger to life, safety, or property, or in an emergency situation.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	It is expressly understood and agreed that this Agreement shall be for the direct benefit of the Owner. Accordingly, Owner shall be granted the right to
	pursue in its own name any rights or remedies against Service Contractor including without limitation, claims for damages granted to other parties under the Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	19
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage150"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	APPENDIX F
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	ARCHITECTURAL AND ENGINEERING GUIDELINES
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	This memorandum will summarize the basic
	requirements of the sixth edition of the Massachusetts State Building Code (MSBC)&nbsp;applicable to the building at 311 Arsenal Street, Watertown. It includes the conditions imposed by MSBC Appeal Board in its decision to permit the roof trusses of
	the building to remain without fire rating.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Basic Building Code Requirements
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The basic requirement of the MSBC applicable to this building are summarized in Table No.&nbsp;1. The occupancy and building characteristic that are the basis for those requirements are identified at the
	beginning of that table. Any deviation from those characteristics including changes of occupancy must be made in compliance with the building code and the intent of the variance which was granted with respect to the roof assembly.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Conditions on the Variance
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Two sets of
	conditions have been imposed on the design and construction of the building in order to justify the variance to permit the roof trusses and deck to be unrated. These are in addition to the standard features of the building required by the building
	code based on its occupancy and physical characteristic. Those requirements are summarized in Table No.&nbsp;1.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	First, in the presentation of
	technical arguments for the variance, it was represented that the following fire protection features would be provided in the building:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	1.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	One connection to the site water mains which are supplied from the Watertown municipal water system.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	2.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	A fire pump to boost system pressures to required levels.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	3.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	A standby power supply for the fire pump.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	4.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	A system of combined standpipe risers to supply sprinkler systems of each floor as well as hose connections within exit stairs.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	5.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Three sprinkler systems per floor with each arranged to be supplied from two separate standpipes.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	6.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Complete supervision of all operation characteristics and components of the sprinkler and standpipe systems.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	7.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Complete coverage of all levels of the building with automatic smoke detectors.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	All of these features have been provided as part of the base building except that tenant sprinkler systems must be arranged to be supplied from two separate standpipes and tenant space fire alarm systems
	must include complete coverage with an addressable automatic smoke detection system for all floors.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Second, two conditions were imposed on
	the fourth floor of the building by the Appeal Board in its decision. One condition requires that ceilings, where provide, have a one hour fire rating. This requirement may be applicable to fully enclosed offices, toilet rooms, storage rooms,
	equipment rooms and similar spaces which are provided with ceilings suspended or framed below the roof trusses. The decision also required that sprinklers be installed both above (in the truss space) and below the ceilings (in the use space), where
	ceilings are provided.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The requirement for a one hour ceiling may be satisfied by installation of a ceiling assembly which has a one hour
	&#147;finish rating&#148; by standard Underwritten Laboratories&#146; test criteria. Such a ceiling will typically require two layers of 5/8 inch Type X gypsum-board appropriately attached to framing above. The ceiling membranes of UL Floor/Ceiling
	Assembly Design No.&nbsp;L532 or L505 would be appropriate for this purpose. The intended fire rating will only be achieved if the ceiling membrane is provided with connections and support equal to that provided by the floor assembly to which it is
	attached in the UL Design (ie. Spacing of framing, frequency of fastener, etc.).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	20
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage151"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Floor Systems
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	2.
</B>
	Provide 2 hour fire ratings for floor/ceiling assemblies as required for construction Type 1B. (T-602).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	3.
</B>
	Provide multiple floor openings arranged as an atrium having features as summarized in Table No.&nbsp;1. (713.3, Exception 5, 404.0)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Interior Walls and Partitions
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	4.
</B>
	Provide unrated partitions for enclosure of exit
	access corridors. (1011.4)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	5.
</B>
	Provide one hour rated partitions as tenant-to-tenant separation walls. (T-602).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	6.
</B>
	Provide two hour fire enclosures for stairway, elevator and mechanical shafts which connect more than three stories and one hour fire rated
	enclosures for stairway and mechanical shafts which connect three stories or less. (T-602, 1014.11, 710.3)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	7.
</B>
	Provide two hour fire
	rated enclosures of all rooms, shafts and closets containing equipment and wiring for emergency power generation, distribution and control. (MA Electrical Code, 700-10).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	8.
</B>
	Provide one hour fire rated walls with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="1">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE; POSITION:RELATIVE; BOTTOM:.8EX">
</SUP>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<FONT SIZE="1">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE; POSITION:RELATIVE; BOTTOM:.8EX">
	&nbsp;3
</SUP>
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2">
	/
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	hour opening protective around the following specific occupancy areas:
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#149;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Trash rooms
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#149;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Physical Plant and Maintenance Shops (302.1.1, T-302.1.1)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	9.
</B>
	Provide smoke partitions designed to resist the passage of smoke constructed of combustible or non-combustible materials which extend from the floor below to the underside of the floor or roof
	above around the following specific occupancy areas:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#149;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Storage rooms over 50 sq. ft. in area (302.1.1, T-302.1.1)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	10.
</B>
	Provide doors to the areas identified in Item&nbsp;9 which are self closing or arranged for automatic closing upon detection of smoke. (302.1.1.1)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Exterior Walls and Roof
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	11.
</B>
	Provide three hour fire ratings for interior and exterior columns supporting more than one floor and two hour fire ratings for columns supporting only one floor or the roof. (T-602).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	12.
</B>
	Provide unrated non-bearing exterior wall components for the building walls. (705.2, T-705.2).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	13.
</B>
	Utilize unlimited openings in exterior walls. (705.3, T-705.3).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	No rating is required
	for exterior walls of a sprinklered building of use Group B occupancy when the fire separation distance for the wall is greater than 5 feet. Unlimited exterior wall openings are permitted in such a wall when the wall has a fire separation distance
	of more than 20 feet.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The fire separation distance of the Arsenal Street wall measured to the centerline of Arsenal Street is 48 feet. The
	fire separation distances of walls not facing immediately adjacent buildings are well in excess of 20 feet.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The physical distance between
	building 311 and the Harvard Printing Building is approximately 37 feet. A fire separation distance of greater than 15 feet for the Harvard Printing Building permits that budling to have an unrated exterior wall with not more than 70% openings. The
	remaining 22 feet is considered the fire separation distance for Building 311. That distance allows the unrated exterior wall with essentially 100% openings that are provided on Building 311.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	21
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage152"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The physical distance between Building 311 and the adjacent parking garage is approximately 55 feet. That
	physical distance permits a fire separation distance of greater than 30 feet for the parking garage and greater that 20 feet for Building 311. In that situation, the exterior wall of Building 311 is permitted to be unrated and have unlimited
	exterior openings.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	14.
</B>
	Do not provide fire rated exterior walls for exit stair enclosures or for the exterior walls of use spaces
	adjacent to exterior walls of exit stairs. (Compliance alternative 1014.11.1).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	MSBC Section&nbsp;1014.11.1 requires that either the exterior
	walls of exit stair enclosures have a one hour rating and have protected openings of that the exterior walls of adjacent use spaces within 10 feet of the stair enclosure be treated in that manner.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	As a compliance alternative to strict compliance with the requirement for exterior wall rating and opening protectives wither within or adjacent to an
	exit stair, close spaced automatic sprinklers will be provided to protect the exterior glass of the stair enclosure. Those sprinklers will help to maintain the integrity of the stairway windows under potential fire exposure.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	15.
</B>
	Do not provide opening protection for any exterior wall openings in this fully sprinklered building. (705.3.1).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	16.
</B>
	Do not provide a fire rated spandrel panel or wall on this fully sprinklered building. (705.4, Exception 2).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Fire Alarm System
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	17.
</B>
	Provide a
	fire alarm system having the basic features required by Section&nbsp;917 and additional features required by the atrium Section&nbsp;404.0. (917.4.2).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	18.
</B>
	Provide addressable system connected automatic some detectors throughout all levels of the building. (NR/Condition of variance).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Complete coverage of the building with addressable type smoke detectors was offered as part of the justification of the requested variance from fire rating requirements applicable to the roof assembly.
	Such protection is considered a condition of the variance.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	19.
</B>
	Activate the fire alarm system using manual pull stations, water-flow
	detectors of the sprinkler system and smoke detectors of the atrium exhaust system. (917.7.1).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Means of Egress
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	20.
</B>
	Provide 2 doors to the corridor system from all rooms or spaces with an occupant load of more than 50 persons or in which the travel distance
	exceeds 75 feet. (T-1017.2).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	21.
</B>
	Install doors which serve rooms with occupants loads of 50 or more persons so as to awing in the
	direction of egress travel. (1017.4).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	22.
</B>
	Where two exit or exit access doors are required from a room or other space, separate the
	doors by a distance equal to or greater than one quarter of the longest diagonal of the area served. (1006.4.1)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	23.
</B>
	Limit dead ends of
	corridors to not more than 20 feet. (1011.2).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	24.
</B>
	Limit the length of a common path of travel in the Use Group B spaces to not more
	than 100 feet. (1011.2.1).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	22
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage153"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	25.
</B>
	Provide unrated exit access corridor enclosures. (1011.4.).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	26.
</B>
	Provide unrated corridor doors. (1011.4.2).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	27.
</B>
	Provide corridors with a minimum clear width of 44 inches. (1011.3).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	28.
</B>
	Utilize interior exit stairs designed in accordance with MSBC Section&nbsp;1014.0 as the required exits of the building. (1014.0).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	29.
</B>
	Provide sufficient egress capacity for the occupant load of each floor of the building separately. (1009.1, 1009.3).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	At the code
	specified area allowance of 100 square feet per person and with an area of not more than 147,000 square feet, the occupant load of the largest floor of the building will be 1,470 persons. There will be four 44 inch wide exits stairs and seven 48
	inch wide exit stairs provided from the upper stories of the building will each have a capacity of 220 persons. The total capacity available from those stairs at an allowance of 0.20 inches per person will be 2,560 persons, well in excess of the
	project population.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	30.
</B>
	Locate exits as required to limit travel distances to less than 150 feet in spaces not separated from the
	atrium and 250 feet in spaces separated from the atria. (404.7, T-1006.5).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	31.
</B>
	Provide exit discharge from exit stairs directly to the
	outside, through rated passageways, sprinklered lobbies or small vestibules. (1020.0).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Elevators
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	32.
</B>
	Provide all elevators having a travel of 25 feet or more with characteristics and controls for fire emergency use in accordance with the MA
	Elevator Code. (MA Elevator Code, 17.39).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	33.
</B>
	Provide one elevator which serves all floors of the building with characteristics and
	controls to permit emergency medical use in accordance with the MA Elevator Code. (MA Elevator Code, 17.40).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Sprinkler Systems
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	34.
</B>
	Provide a complete automatic suppression system in all portions of the building in accordance with the requirements of
	Article&nbsp;9. (904.2, 404.2).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Standpipe
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	35.
</B>
	Provide fire standpipes in the building with hose connections located in accordance with the criteria of NFPA 14. (914.4, 914.5).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Water Supply
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	36.
</B>
	Provide water supplies for the sprinkler and standpipe systems
	using a connection to the municipal water supply. (NFPA 13, 14).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	37.
</B>
	Size the supply piping of the combined sprinkler and standpipe
	water supply system in accordance with the criteria of NFPA 14. (914.3).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	38.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
</B>
	Provide connections of each sprinkler system to two separate standpipe risers. (NR/Condition of variance).
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	23
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage154"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Emergency Power
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	39.
</B>
	Provide an emergency generator to provide standby power for the fire alarm system, exit signs, emergency lights, the atria smoke control systems and the fire pump. (917.6, 1023.4,1024.4, 921.5,
	Condition of variance).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The provisions of standby power for the fire pump was a condition of the variance from the requirements for the fire
	rating of the roof assembly.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Interior Finish
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	40.
</B>
	Utilize interior finish as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#149;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Class&nbsp;I interior finish within all exit stairs.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#149;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Class&nbsp;II or better interior finish within all exit access corridors serving only office areas.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#149;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Class&nbsp;III or better interior finish within rooms or spaces of assembly and office areas. (T-803.4).
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	41.
</B>
	Utilize traditional floor coverings such as wood, vinyl, linoleum, terrazzo or other resilient floor finish material or carpeting which
	complies with the DOC FF-1 &#147;pill test&#148; (CPSC 16 CFR, Part&nbsp;1630) in all spaces including exits and exit access corridors. (805.3, Exception).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	24
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage155"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	TABLE NO. 1
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Summary of Atrium Requirements
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Massachusetts States Building Code &#151;
	Sixth Edition
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	1
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Classify any openings in the floor systems connecting two or more stories as an atrium. (404.1).
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	2
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Provide a complete automatic suppression system in the portions of the building not separated from the atrium by two hour fire separation partition and floor assemblies
	(404.2).
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	3
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Limit the use of the floor of the atrium low hazard uses with approved materials and decorations unless appropriately protected with automatic fire suppression system.
	(404.3).
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	4
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Allow exit discharge through the atrium in accordance with the rules for exit discharge through a lobby in Section&nbsp;1020.0. (404.3.1).
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	5
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Provide a smoke control system as required by Section&nbsp;921.0. (404.4)
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	6
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Separate the atrium from adjacent spaces by 1-hour fire separation walls, fire rated windows or tempered, wired or laminated glass walls constructed as required by
	Section&nbsp;404.5 [Exception 2] except as noted in Item&nbsp;7 below (404,5).
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	7
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Allow up to three levels of the building to be open to the atrium without the separation required by Item&nbsp;6. (404.5, Exception 3).
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Only limited portions of the First Floor of the building will be open to the atrium. Most spaces will be separated from the atrium spaces by glass walls
	protected by closely spaced sprinklers.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	8
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Provide automatic smoke detectors within and at the perimeter of the atrium and on the ceilings of spaces not separated from the atrium (404.6.)
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The extent of coverage by smoke detectors is not explicitly stated in the code. Coverage should be provided in the area
	immediately surrounding the atrium and all corridors which are open to the atrium. The specific extent of coverage should be determined in discussions with the authorities having jurisdiction.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	9
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Arrange automatic smoke detectors within the atrium space to sound fire alarms upon activation of an two or more of the detectors. (Not required).
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	No explicit requirement that two or more smoke detectors be required to operate before fire alarms are sounded is found in the
	current edition of the code. However, that means of operation is one reasonable approach to limiting the effect of false alarms from smoke detectors (Such a requirement did appear in previous editions of the NBC.) Other technical approaches to
	limiting the false alarm problem are available such as addressable detectors and alarm confirmation circuits. The specific arrangement of the detection system in this facility should be determined in discussions with the authorities having
	jurisdiction
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	10
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Activate the fire alarm system using signals from sprinkler system water-flow detectors and manual pull stations. (406.6, 917.7,1).
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	11
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Utilize a voice or non-voice alarm system which complies with the detailed provisions of Section&nbsp;917.9. (404.6)
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	12
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
</B>
	Limit the distance of exit access travel within the atrium on other than the lowest levels of the building to not more than 150 feet. (404.7).
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	25
</FONT>
</P>

<A NAME="eolPage157"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Lessor and the Lessee shall hereinafter be collectively referred to as the &#147;
<B>
	Parties
</B>
	&#148;
	and individually as a &#147;
<B>
	Party
</B>
	&#148;.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	WHEREAS:
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	A. The Lessor, is the owner, developer and promoter of a building named &#147;S.P. Infocity&#148; situated at MGR Salai, Kandanchavadi, Perungudi, Chennai - 600096 (&#147;
<B>
	Building
</B>
	&#148;) which is
	more particularly described in
<B>
	Schedule A
</B>
	hereunder.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	B. The Lessee is engaged in the business of Information Technology/Information
	Technology Enabled Services (&#147;
<B>
	IT/ITES
</B>
	&#148;) under the trademark/brand name &#147;ATHENA HEALTH TECHNOLOGY PRIVATE LIMITED&#148; and has acquired a high reputation and considerable goodwill in the said business.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	C. The Parties executed Heads of terms dated 25th&nbsp;May, 2011 whereby the Lessor has agreed to grant to the Lessee lease of the Demised Premises (as
	defined in Clause 2 herein).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	D. The Parties confirm that they have carefully read the terms and conditions of the grant of lease of the
	Demised Premises as set forth in this Deed and have understood and accepted their obligations and liabilities as set forth herein. The Parties, in their own judgment and investigations, have decided to enter into this Deed which is self-contained,
	complete, and final in all respects. The Parties undertake to faithfully abide by all the terms and conditions of this Deed.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	NOW THEREFORE
	IN CONSIDERATION OF THE MUTUAL PROMISES AND COVENANTS SET FORTH HEREINAFTER, THE PARTIES HERETO AGREE AND WITNESSETH AS FOLLOWS:
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	1.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	INTERPRETATION
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	In this Deed unless the
	context otherwise requires:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(i) words importing the singular shall also include the plural and vice-versa, words importing a particular
	gender include all genders and words importing persons shall include companies or other associations of persons, other bodies corporate and government bodies or agencies;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Page - 2 -
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage158"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(ii) any obligation or agreement on part of two or more persons shall bind each of them jointly and
	severally;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(iii) headings have been inserted for convenience only and shall not control the meaning and shall not control and affect the
	construction or interpretation of the terms of this Deed;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(iv) reference to Articles, clauses, sub-clauses, annexures and schedules shall,
	except where the context otherwise requires, be deemed to be references to Articles, clauses, sub-clauses, annexures or schedules of or to this Deed ;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(v) whenever in this Deed, the consent or approval of the Lessor is required to be obtained, such consent shall be in writing and shall be subject to such conditions as the Lessor may deem fit to impose
	on the Lessee in the circumstances;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(vi) references to notices to be given by 1 (one) Party to the other shall mean prior written notice and
	unless otherwise prescribed, such notice is to be given in reasonable time;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(vii) any obligation on either Party not to do an act or thing
	includes an obligation on such Party not to permit or allow that act or thing to be done;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(viii) any reference to any period commencing
	&#147;from&#148; a specified day or date and &#147;till&#148; or &#147;until&#148; a specified day or date shall include both such days or dates;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(ix) any reference to day shall mean a reference to a calendar day and any reference to month shall mean a reference to a calendar month and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(x) the Schedules and Annexures to this Agreement form an integral part of this Agreement and will be in full force and effect as though they were expressly set out in the body of this Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Page - 3 -
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage159"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	2. DEMISED PREMISES
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	In consideration of the lease rent hereinafter reserved, the Lessor hereby grants to the Lessee, lease of the Unit bearing Module No.&nbsp;3 &amp; 4 on the ninth floor of Block A, having a total area of
	37506 (Thirty Seven Thousand Five Hundred and Six) square feet as more specifically described in
<B>
	Schedule B
</B>
	herein, in accordance with the floor plan enclosed and marked in
<B>
	Annexure A - Part I
</B>
	hereto (&#147;
<B>
	Demised
	Premises
</B>
	&#148;).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	The Super Built Up Area will be calculated as follows: Usable area / (78% +/- 2%).
</B>
	The usable area is defined as
	the area that will be used by the Lessee exclusively for their use. It is the sum of the office area, the dedicated wash rooms, dedicated AHU rooms, dedicated electrical rooms and the dedicated passage ways to the washrooms. The detailed area
	statement is described in
<B>
	Annexure A - Part II
</B>
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	The detailed warm shell specification of the leased space that will
	be handed over by the Lessor to the Lessee is described in Annexure A - Part III.
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	3. POSSESSION
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	3.1.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Demised Premises shall be handed over to the Lessee on or before 24
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="1">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE; POSITION:RELATIVE; BOTTOM:.8EX">
	th
</SUP>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&nbsp;October, 2011, subject to:
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:5%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(i) this Deed being duly executed; and registered.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:5%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(ii) the refundable security deposit as per Clause 7.1 herein having been received by the Lessor from the Lessee.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	4. LEASE TERM
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	4.1.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The term of the lease herein (&#147;the Lease Term&#148;) shall be for a period of 3 (three) years commencing from 1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="1">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE; POSITION:RELATIVE; BOTTOM:.8EX">
	st
</SUP>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	of November 2011 (&#147;Lease Commencement Date&#148;) to 31
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="1">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE; POSITION:RELATIVE; BOTTOM:.8EX">
	st
</SUP>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	October, 2014 (&#147;Lease Expiry Date&#148;). The Lease Term shall
	be deemed to have commenced immediately from the Lease Commencement Date.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Page - 4 -
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage160"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	5. CONSIDERATION
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	5.1.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	As and by way of consideration for the grant of lease of the Demised Premises by the Lessor to the Lessee, the Lessee shall pay to the Lessor lease rent (&#147;
<B>
	the
	Warm Shell Lease Rent
</B>
	, of Rs. 34.00 (Rupees Thirty Four only) per square foot per month of the billable area i.e. 37,506 (Thirty Seven Thousand, Five hundred and Six) square feet, of the Demised Premises amounting to Rs 12,75,204.00 (Rupees
	Twelve lakhs Seventy Five Thousand Two hundred and Four only) per month.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	5.2.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Lessee shall pay in advance to the Lessor, for the entire Lease Term, the Warm Shell Lease Rent in respect of 1 (one) calendar month within 7 (seven) working days
	of the beginning of the first month of every such one month term. In addition to the Warm Shell Lease Rent, the Lessee shall pay to the Lessor, the applicable service tax or any such tax that may be imposed by the relevant authority on the Warm
	Shell Lease Rent during the Lease Term. With respect to the payment of service tax amounts to the relevant authorities the Lessor confirms that they shall periodically furnish to the Lessee, proof of the service tax remittances
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:5%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Warm Shell Lease Rent shall be subject to deduction of income tax at source at the rates, as applicable,
	from time to time, unless the Lessor provides a lower withholding order issued by the Indian Income Tax authorities. The Lessee shall provide details of the tax deducted at source, and issue TDS certificates, at the end of every financial year. Rent
	for any part of a month will be prorated on the basis of a 30 day month and paid for that portion of the month only.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	5.3.
<B>
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
</B>
	The obligation of the Lessee to make payments to the Lessor towards the Warm Shell Lease Rent as stipulated in Clauses 5.1 and 5.2 herein will be effected by the
	Lessee upon receipt of an invoice and/or demand being raised by the Lessor.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	5.4.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	In the event the lease is renewed as stated in clause in clause 30 hereinbelow, the Warm Shell Lease Rent for the Demised Premises shall escalate by 15% (Fifteen
	percent) on the last paid Warm Shell Lease Rent.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Page - 5 -
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage161"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	5.5.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	In the event of any delay in payment of the Warm Shell Lease Rent beyond the due date for the same, the Lessee shall be liable to pay an interest on such amount(s) due
	at the rate of 18% (Eighteen per cent) per annum for the period commencing from the due date for such payment till the date of complete payment of the same.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">

</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">

	in
<B>
	Annexure B
</B>
	hereto.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">

	6. WARM SHELL LEASE RENT COMMENCEMENT DATE
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:5%;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Lessee shall be entitled for Warm Shell Lease Rent-free period commencing from the Lease Commencement Date till
	the 31
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="1">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE; POSITION:RELATIVE; BOTTOM:.8EX">
	st
</SUP>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&nbsp;December, 2011 (&#147;
<B>
	Rent Free Fit Out
	Period
</B>
	&#148;).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:5%;PADDING-BOTTOM:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The &#147;
<B>
	Warm Shell Lease Rent Commencement Date
</B>
	&#148; shall be 1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="1">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE; POSITION:RELATIVE; BOTTOM:.8EX">
	st
</SUP>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&nbsp;January, 2012.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:5%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Warm shell Lease Rent shall become due and payable from the above mentioned Warm Shell Lease Rent Commencement Date irrespective of
	whether the Lessee completes the fit outs within the Rent Free Fit out Period.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	7.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	INTEREST FREE REFUNDABLE SECURITY DEPOSIT
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	7.1.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Lessee shall deposit and keep deposited with the Lessor on execution hereof a sum of Rs. 51,00,816.00 - (Rupees Fifty One lakhs Eight Hundred and Sixteen only) as
	and by way of an Interest Free Refundable Security Deposit (&#147;
<B>
	the Security Deposit
</B>
	&#148;) equivalent to 4(four) months of Warm Shell Lease Rent, to secure the obligations of the Lessee under this Lease. The aforesaid sum of security
	deposit shall be paid by the Lessee to the Lessor on or before the signing of this Agreement. In the event the lease is renewed in accordance with clause 30 hereinbelow, the Interest Free Security Deposit shall escalate in proportion to the increase
	in rent, i.e 15% after every 3 (Three) years of the Lease term to ensure that at all times, the Interest Free Security Deposit shall be equivalent to 4 (four) month warm shell lease rent.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	7.2.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Security Deposit shall not be refundable to the Lessee during the continuance of this Agreement.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:5%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Security deposit shall be refunded to the Lessee free of interest 2(Two) week upon expiry of this Agreement or sooner determination
	thereof or provided herein, only upon
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Page - 6 -
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage162"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:5%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	the Lessee removing itself, its agents, employees, staff and all other persons in occupation of the Demised Premises and its respective belongings, chattels, articles and removable fittings and
	fixtures and on handing over to the Lessor physical and actual vacant and peaceful possession of the Demised Premises. After peaceful hand over of the property by the Lessee to the Lessor, both parties shall sign a handover / take over document of
	the same and the Lessor shall specify in the handover / take over document, that the refund of the deposit shall be made within 2 (two) weeks thereon. It is hereby agreed that 30 (thirty) days prior to the expiry/early termination of this Lease
	Deed, both Parties shall carry out a joint assessment of the damages / the outstanding payments, if any, due from the Lessee and payable to the Lessor. The Lessee, based on the joint assessment, shall pay such outstanding amounts, if any, to the
	Lessor on the date of the expiry / early termination of this Lease Deed.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:5%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	If the Lessee fails to pay such outstanding amounts
	the same shall be adjusted against the Security Deposit.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:5%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	If the Lessor fails to refund the Security Deposit as described
	hereinabove, the Lessor will be liable to pay an interest on such amount(s) due at the rate of 18% (Eighteen per cent) per annum for the period commencing from the due date for such payment till the date of complete payment of the same.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	8.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	TAXES
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:5%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Lessor shall
	be responsible, at its sole cost, for all present and future municipal taxes and property taxes with regard to the Demised Premises during the Lease Term. However, all taxes payable directly on account of the business activities carried on by the
	Lessee in the Demised Premises shall be borne and paid by the Lessee. Each Party shall indemnify the other Party against any claims, proceedings, actions, etc. for non-payment or delay in payment of tax payable by it in accordance with this Clause.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;

</B>

</TD>

</B>

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">

	9.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Lessor shall, at all times during the Lease Term, keep the Demised Premises and the Building insured against any structural damage, damage by fire,
	earthquake, riots and other risks at its own costs for the entire value of the Demised Premises/Building. Such insurance shall be a general fire and allied perils and third party insurance that would be
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">

	&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage163"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:5%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	expected to be obtained in respect of a high quality commercial facility with only regular, commercially acceptable exclusions. The Lessor shall provide 1(one) certified copy of the said
	insurance policy to the Lessee.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;

	9.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Lessee shall take a general fire and allied perils and third party insurance at its own cost for its goods and articles lying in the Demised Premises. The Lessee
	shall provide 1(one) certified copy of the said insurance policy to the Lessor.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>

</B>

</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	PARKING FACILITY
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	10.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Lessee and its customers, guests, employees, contractors, agents, servants, visitors and invitees shall, subject to availability, park their vehicles only in the
	spaces specifically earmarked/set aside, from time to time, by the Lessor for parking and subject to the payment of such parking fee as may be applicable.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	10.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Lessor shall provide to the Lessee for its exclusive use, 37 (Thirty Seven) covered car parking spaces and 74 (Seventy Four) two wheeler parking spaces, free of
	cost during the Lease Term. A detailed plan delineating the covered car parking spaces and two wheeler parking spaces is shown in
<B>
	Annexure C
</B>
	enclosed hereto.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	10.3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	In the event the Lessee requests for additional car parking space, the Lessor shall, at his sole discretion, subject to availability, make the same available to the
	Lessee, at the rate of Rs. 2,500 (Rupees Two Thousand Five Hundred only) per car parking space per month for each additional car parking space and Rs. 350 (Rupees Three Hundred Fifty only) per two wheeler parking space per month for each additional
	two wheeler parking space.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:5%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Lessee shall pay such amount to the Lessor in respect of each calendar month
	within 7 (seven) working days of the beginning of each month.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:5%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	In the event of the lease being renewed the charges for
	additional car parking spaces shall escalate by 15&nbsp;% (fifteen percent) over and above the last paid Additional Car /Two Wheeler Parking charges.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	10.4.
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Lessee agrees, after notice thereof, to abide by all rules, regulations and restrictions framed by the Lessor, and use its reasonable efforts to cause its
	customers, guests, visitors, contractors, invitees, agents and servants to conform thereto. The Lessee shall, upon request, use its reasonable efforts to furnish to the Lessor, the registration numbers and other details of the vehicles used by the
	Lessee and its employees, etc.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
